work.name: NVIDIA
work.summary: Currently working as an MLOps engineer, developing infrastructure for training large language and vision models.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

education.institution: Computer Science Department, The Technion, Israel Institute of Technology, Israel

awards.title: Technion President's List
awards.summary: Graduated summa cum laude and received the Technion President's List award for outstanding academic performance.

awards.title: Technion's Computer Science Excellent Students Program (SAMBA)
awards.summary: Selected for the SAMBA program, which is designed for outstanding students in the Computer Science Department at the Technion. The program includes participating in teaching in the Faculty of Computer Science.
